page.description: The A5_DISPLAYHELPTOPIC() function attempts to retrieve the selected topic from either the local compiled help file (.CHM format) stored in the Alpha Anywhere program directory or from the webhelp located at Help_Project. The choice is made by the user setting specified under Help > Help Source. Source is .chm or Web depending on help preference
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_DisplayHelpTopic(C topic [,C topic_type [,C chmfile ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = Topic was found .F. = Topic was not found

argument.name: topic
argument.description: The topic or index entry to use to retrieve a page from the help text. A table of contents reference must contain both the folder and filename of the topic. Note : To position the cursor to a topic and bookmark, append " #bookmark_name " after the ".htm ". Note : References to index entries must be top level entries.

argument.name: topic_type
argument.description:
Character. Optional. Default = "index_entry".
"toc" = match table of contents entry
"index_entry" = match index entry

argument.name: chmfile
argument.description: Optional. The default name and location for the webhelp is "http://support.alphasoftware.com/alphafivehelp/index.htm". The CHM file is in the Alpha Anywhere program folder. Character
